simplified: 当官不为民做主不如回家卖红薯

pronunciation.pinyin: dāng guān bù weì mín zuò zhǔ bù rú huí jiā mài hóng shǔ
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: dang1 guan1 bu4 wei4 min2 zuo4 zhu3 bu4 ru2 hui2 jia1 mai4 hong2 shu3

details.simplified: 当官不为民做主不如回家卖红薯
details.traditional: 當官不為民做主不如回家賣紅薯

meanings.value: if an official does not put the people first, he might as well go home and sell sweet potatoes
